name: Siegebreak Engineer
description: Siegebreak Engineers treat combat as a structural problem, demolishing cover, shattering formations, and breaking enemies through controlled destruction.

3.name: Field Modularity
3.description: You adopt two Engineering Modes that modify your firearm and defenses. You may change one mode during a short rest.

3.name: Controlled Detonation
3.description: When you hit with a firearm attack, you may spend charges to create a localized blast.

7.name: Battlefield Architect
7.description: You ignore most cover, move freely through difficult terrain, and punish creatures when you destroy objects or cover.

11.name: Structural Analysis
11.description: At the start of combat, designate a target to suffer bonus damage and resistance bypass for one minute.

15.name: Siege Override
15.description: Once per short rest, you replace an attack with a devastating cone blast that devastates structures.

18.name: Master Engine
18.description: Your detonations improve, cost fewer charges, and cause destroyed objects to explode outward.
